Root Generator¶

Usage¶

This script is used to generate a synthetic root system.

Several root parameters have been taken from the paper: Mycorrhizal associations change root functionality: a 3D modelling study on competitive interactions between plants for light and nutrients (de Vries et al., 2021).

By default, synthetic data are written to data/root_sim/root_sim.csv.

The nplants parameter specifies the number of plants to generate root systems for.

The morder parameter determines the maximum root order.

The froot_threshold parameter determines the root diameter threshold for classifying a root as either a structural or fine root.

Arguments¶

Generate a synthetic root system.

usage: root_gen [-h] [--from_config {0,1}] [--max_vattempts MAX_VATTEMPTS] [--correction_angle CORRECTION_ANGLE] [--visualise {0,1}] [--species {0,1}] [--dir DIR] [--out OUT]
                [--round ROUND] [--stats {0,1}] [--bins BINS] [--nplants NPLANTS] [--morder MORDER] [--r_ratio R_RATIO] [--froot_threshold FROOT_THRESHOLD] [--rnum_out RNUM_OUT]
                [--rnum_in RNUM_IN] [--min_prlength MIN_PRLENGTH] [--max_prlength MAX_PRLENGTH] [--origin_min ORIGIN_MIN] [--origin_max ORIGIN_MAX] [--srnum_min SRNUM_MIN]
                [--srnum_max SRNUM_MAX] [--snum_growth SNUM_GROWTH] [--min_srlength MIN_SRLENGTH] [--max_srlength MAX_SRLENGTH] [--snum SNUM] [--fix_seg {0,1}]
                [--length_reduction LENGTH_REDUCTION] [--vary VARY] [--random_seed RANDOM_SEED]

Named Arguments¶

--from_config

Possible choices: 0, 1

Override parameters using a root_config.yaml file. Defaults to ‘0’.

Default: 0

--max_vattempts

The maximum number of attempts to fix each validation error. Defaults to ‘15’.

Default: 15

--correction_angle

The rotation angle about the y-axis for out-of-bounds roots. Defaults to ‘90’.

Default: 90

--visualise

Possible choices: 0, 1

Visualise the root generation process at each transformation step. Defaults to ‘0’.

Default: 0

--species

Possible choices: 0, 1

The species associated with the root system. Defaults to ‘0’.

Default: 0

--dir

Output directory. Defaults to ‘data/root_sim’.

Default: “data/root_sim”

--out

Output CSV file name. Defaults to ‘root_sim.csv’.

Default: “root_sim.csv”

--round

Number of decimal places to round values when writing to file. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--stats

Possible choices: 0, 1

Calculate statistics for the root system. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--bins

Number of bins when binning root data. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--nplants

The number of plants to generate roots for. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--morder

The maximum root organ order. Defaults to ‘4’.

Default: 4

--r_ratio

Ratio of fine roots to structural roots based upon overall root diameter. Defaults to ‘0.5’.

Default: 0.5

--froot_threshold

Threshold for classifying a root as a fine root, rather than a structural root (mm). Defaults to ‘1.5’.

Default: 1.5

--rnum_out

The number of outer primary roots to be generated. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--rnum_in

The number of inner primary roots to be generated. Defaults to ‘8’.

Default: 8

--min_prlength

The minimum length of each primary root (cm). Defaults to ‘20’.

Default: 20

--max_prlength

The maximum length of each primary root (cm). Defaults to ‘30’.

Default: 30

--origin_min

The minimum distance of the initial primary root from the origin (cm). Defaults to ‘0.01’.

Default: 0.01

--origin_max

The maximum distance of the initial primary root from the origin (cm). Defaults to ‘0.1’.

Default: 0.1

--srnum_min

The minimum number of secondary roots to be generated. Defaults to ‘3’.

Default: 3

--srnum_max

The maximum number of secondary roots to be generated. Defaults to ‘4’.

Default: 4

--snum_growth

The growth rate for the number of secondary roots per root order. Defaults to ‘0.5’.

Default: 0.5

--min_srlength

The minimum length of each secondary root (cm). Defaults to ‘100’.

Default: 100

--max_srlength

The maximum length of each secondary root (cm). Defaults to ‘220’.

Default: 220

--snum

The number of segments per root. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--fix_seg

Possible choices: 0, 1

Use a fixed segment size for each root. Defaults to ‘0’.

Default: 0

--length_reduction

The root length reduction factor. Defaults to ‘0.5’.

Default: 0.5

--vary

Random variation in degrees of subsequent segments along x, y, and z axes. Defaults to ‘30’.

Default: 30

--random_seed

The random seed. Defaults to ‘None’.
